emergency_supplies.name: First Aid Kit
emergency_supplies.description: A kit containing medical supplies for providing first aid in emergencies.

emergency_supplies.name: Flashlight
emergency_supplies.description: A portable electric light source powered by batteries.

emergency_supplies.name: Bottled Water
emergency_supplies.description: Clean drinking water stored in bottles for emergency hydration.

emergency_supplies.name: Non-perishable Food
emergency_supplies.description: Food items that do not require refrigeration and have a long shelf life.

emergency_supplies.name: Emergency Blanket
emergency_supplies.description: A compact, lightweight blanket made of heat-reflective material.

emergency_supplies.name: Multi-tool
emergency_supplies.description: A versatile tool containing multiple functions, such as pliers, knives, and screwdrivers.
